description.raw:
Need upstream branch to be checked out by git plugin to get the gbp buildsystem happy.

Tested here:

* dsl: [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/\_dsl\_debian/613/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/_dsl_debian/613/))

    ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=_dsl_debian&build=613)
* test run: 

    ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition-math6-pkg_builder-master-debian_sid-amd64&build=11)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition-math6-pkg\_builder-master-debian\_sid-amd64/11/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition-math6-pkg_builder-master-debian_sid-amd64/11/))



‌
